column1: #Text=Foreign speculators and money launderers have made Vancouver unaffordable for Canadians.
#Text=If most of them are Chinese, and I don't know that they are, tough.
#Text=The law should have gone further to address what is, in reality, a crisis.
#Text=A moratorium on housing purchases by foreigners should have been passed to force a correction.
#Text=All the tax did was kick the can a few feet down the road.
#Text=Just the cost of doing business to the speculators and the crooks.
#Text=Canada needs to protect the well-being of Canadians first, not as a feeble afterthought.
